alert.note: Alert for Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Clarita Valley; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 12:57AM PST until January 22 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 2 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. Strongest winds in the mountains and Antelope Valley foothills. * WHERE...The mountains of Southwest California, Antelope Valley foothills, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 2 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
